reviewText: I bought this for my three year old niece and she loves it. Overall it is a good movie for kids but it is a tad short.

My daughter absolutely loves Little Witch books.  This DVD combines the 2 books  "Little Witch's Big night" and "Happy Birthday, Little Witch".  I can't count the amount of times she has watched this dvd, much less the amount of time I have spent reading all of little witch's books to her.  She is 4 1/2 years old.  I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who enjoys a little good clean magic in their life.
